mean_cn: n.竞争对手；  v.与……竞争，与……相匹敌
mean_en: a person, company or thing that competes with another in sport, business, etc.
sentence: The two lions are rivals and will fight each other to become the new leader.
sentence_trans: 这两只狮子是竞争对手，它们为了成为新的头领即将展开战斗。
word_etyma: riv河 + al表名词 → 由“河”引申为“流动，跑 → 一起跑 → rival竞争者
